sentence.Network_en: Our unconventional behaviour did in fact shock some of our more straitlaced friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们这一不合常规的行为实际上着实让我们的一些一本正经的朋友吓了一大跳。

sentence.Network_en: My straitlaced aunt anna doesn't approve of my miniskirts.
sentence.Network_cn: 我刻板的安娜姑母不喜欢我的迷你裙.

sentence.Network_en: Not " getting " deception or nuance, they are straitlaced and humorless.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们无法 [ 察觉 ] 欺骗或细微的表情, 因此显得死板而不具幽默感.

PerfectNetExp.abs: straitjacket 紧身衣straitlaced 严格的straitly 狭窄地

entry.tran: (道德方面)一本正经的，古板的，拘谨保守的
entry.def: If you describe someone as strait-laced, you disapprove of them because they have very strict views about what kind of behaviour is moral or acceptable.

example.ex: He was criticised for being boring, strait-laced and narrow-minded...
example.tran: 他被指无趣乏味，古板守旧，心胸狭窄。

example.ex: Our unconventional behaviour did in fact shock some of our more straitlaced friends.
example.tran: 我们这一不合常规的行为实际上着实让我们的一些一本正经的朋友吓了一大跳。

sentences.sentence: "my straitlaced Aunt Anna doesn't approve of my miniskirts"

auth_sentence.content: The normally straitlaced Lo was seen removing his glasses to wipes tears from his eyes after he burst out laughing.
auth_sentence.res_content: The normally straitlaced Lo was seen removing his glasses to wipes tears from his eyes after he burst out laughing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The normally straitlaced Lo was seen removing his glasses to wipes tears from his eyes after he burst out laughing.

auth_sentence.content: Swinging London must have been a shock to the straitlaced young officer from the Libyan desert.
auth_sentence.res_content: Swinging London must have been a shock to the straitlaced young officer from the Libyan desert.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Swinging London must have been a shock to the straitlaced young officer from the Libyan desert.
